Name: Under the Moonlit Banyan
Description: You learned from Lingyang about the story of a Jingle Beast. It is said that they once lived in the vicinity of the Violet Banyan in Dim Forest. Why not go and take a look?
QuestDesc: You learned from Lingyang about the story of a Jingle Beast. It is said that they once lived in the vicinity of the Violet Banyan in Dim Forest. Why not go and take a look?

Conditions.PreQuestName: When the Forest is No Longer Dim

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, {PlayerName}, long time no see! Do you still remember me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's me, Bei Shi! My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who's that... It's me, Bei Shi! My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We at the Pioneer Association are planning an in-depth investigation into the Jingle Beast's mysteries.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've read lots of ancient books on this topic during this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The books said the Jingle Beast used to live near the Violet Banyan, so I proposed coming here for an investigation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But our plan had to be put on hold because of the dangerous spores here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until not long ago, the Academy sent us a message that the spores had been cleared. We hurried over here as soon as we got the all-clear from them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And you know what? We really found some traces of a large creature having lived here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The researcher on our team did a quick analysis, and they've came to the preliminary conclusion that it must be the Jingle Beast.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And the Moon Lanterns on the tree... The Jingle Beast, or maybe its family too, they must have put them up there... Why did they do that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Has the Jingle Beast learned how to talk already?

Dialogues.Speaker: Bei Shi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But why would it choose to learn the Lucky Greetings, of all things...
